name: Savior (CarlsonAndPeeters)
description:
Savior: On the Advantages of Unconventional Weaponry in Combating the Zombie Apocalypse

Made in 48 Hours for Ludum Dare 32 Compo

A cure for the Zombie Virus has been found, but Zombies still roam. Worse, they've invested the lab where the cure is being made! Find the serum and save everyone inside. The Zombies aren't your enemies, they're your friends! Kind of...I mean they'll try to eat you, but they'll feel bad about it.

A stealth/platformer/puzzle game. Short, sweet, and somewhat silly.

--Controls--
Movement: Arrow Keys or A/D
Jump: Z or J
Use Syringe: X or K
Hide / Go through Doors : SPACE
Restart Level: R
Mute: M

---------------------------------------

Ludum Dare Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-32/?action=preview&uid=28902

Code: C#
